body:
I tried to add

``` yaml
   blas:
        paths:
            blas: <system>
        buildable: False
    lapack:
        paths:
            lapack: <system>
        buildable: False
```

to my packages.py file as suggested by https://github.com/LLNL/spack/issues/571 but after adding it spack still goes off and tries to build openblas (which by the way is not particularly portable and often cannot be build which is why I want to use the system blas/lapack). 

Is there a spack option that tells WHY spack is making each decision as to which package to build vs reuse etc?
title: How to get spack to use system blas/lapack
